Ah yes, just another day in NTR paradise. Full of dumbass whore that can't even think on how to handle a situation where you two are stuck together in a snowy weather. I mean, there are a LOT of ways to handle the cold like heating your palms in a certain speed then put it on your cheeks or doubling your clothes. And if he's sexually harassing you, FVCKING RUN AND OPEN THE DOOR! LOCK THAT BASTARD BEFORE HE GETS YOU! Oh my god, I just don't get it. This story can differentiate the WILL OF LOVE and the WILL OF A SLUT. If you cannot fight back, then kick his fvcking dick then slam his head. HE DESERVES IT! If you truly love your boyfriend, your not gonna think the DUMBEST IDEA like this whore and that bastard. Well, if your a slut. Then you'll literally get raped and not fighting back. Poor MC, he doesn't deserve to be cucked. Well, there's no such thing as wholesome in the NTR paradise. But amazing artwork, top tier 100/10! And for the plot, it's bullshit and I'm not gonna rate it.

You know, I don't really mind NTR. But I just feel like commenting on the story. Like 1. How did he get the panties off on page 20 and 2. If he's going to rape you just say you'll sue for rape?? He's black and you're female, the guy is definitely gonna back off after hearing that. I know it's hentai logic but I'm kinda just sick of the whole "I CaN't dO ANYthInG tO StOp ThIs" trope that I see in this genre. Getting kinda old. On that note I'd also like the cuckee to stop being retarded for once and at least try to do something. He can still get NTR'D in the end but it's just the same thing over and over again of the dude getting cucked while he has absolutely no idea. And even if he WERE to find out he'd still most likely do nothing. Again I'm not hating on NTR or anything, but I just wish there would at least be more of a fight from the cuckee and girlfriends side.
